item.title: Contribute to MPORM
item.description: You can do anything to help deliver a better MPORM, including: Program Create pull request on Github to fix issues, agreed features from Github Issues Documentation Editing Make MPORMâ€™s documentation better by commiting to Github Translate this site

item.title: Creating the Documentation
item.description: Today, I searched hugo on Github and found this BOOK theme. So I decided to use it for one of my projects MPORM. That’s all. _ __ ___ _____ ___ _ __ _ __ ___ | '_ ` _ \| __ \/ _ \| `__/| '_ ` _ \ | | | | | | |___| |_| | | | | | | | | |_| |_| |_|_| \___/|_| |_| |_| |_|
